titles: The bacchanalian sessions, or, The contention of liquors with a farewel to wine / by the author of the Search after claret, &c. ; to which is added, a satyrical poem on one who had injur'd his memory, by a friend.
author: Ames, Richard, d. 1693.
notes: Attributed to Richard Ames. cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Wine and wine making --  Early works to 1800.
